articles.description: The Delhi High Court held on Tuesday that the first owner of copyright in the 1966 Bengali film ‘Nayak’ is legendary filmmaker late Satyajit Ray who wrote the s
articles.content: The Delhi High Court held on Tuesday that the first owner of copyright in the 1966 Bengali film Nayak is legendary filmmaker late Satyajit Ray who wrote the screenplay for the movie.
